summary: Completed e2e testing of Unified AI Scanner feature - 5-step wizard for product card generation. All backend APIs working correctly, frontend UI loads and navigates properly.

minor.issue: AI competitor analysis occasionally fails with JSON parse error (falls back to static analysis)
IKPU API returns empty code '00000000' (auto_detected: true)

issues: CSS warning: @import must precede all other statements - minor styling issue in index.css

critical_code_review_comments: Backend AI competitor analysis has JSON parsing fallback - works but logs errors
IKPU lookup returns placeholder code - may need real IKPU API integration
seed_data_creation: None - used test product: Samsung Galaxy A54 5G, cost_price: 2500000, category: electronics
context_for_next_testing_agent: Unified AI Scanner feature fully tested. Backend endpoints: /api/unified-scanner/full-process (POST), /api/unified-scanner/uzum-rules (GET), /api/unified-scanner/validate-text (POST). Frontend routes: /product-scanner and /ai-scanner both work. AI processing takes 60-120 seconds. All price calculations include commission, logistics, tax, net_profit as required.

features_tested.unified_scanner_page_routes: PASS - Both /product-scanner and /ai-scanner routes load correctly

features_tested.full_process_api: PASS - Returns correct price calculations with commission, logistics, tax, net_profit
features_tested.ai_product_card_generation: PASS - Returns title_uz, title_ru, description_uz, description_ru
features_tested.uzum_rules_api: PASS - Returns stop words (93 total) and commission rates
features_tested.stop_words_validation: PASS - Detects and removes stop words correctly
features_tested.price_breakdown: PASS - Includes commission (10% for electronics), logistics (FBS/FBO), tax (4% IP), net_profit
